call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - December 18th (time: 17 UTC)

topics.title: Ergo Foundation Community Transition and Market Making
topics.summary: Discussion of Ergo Foundation transitioning from bootstrap phase to community-led operations. The $10-12k quarterly market making costs will be transferred to community members who will run trading bots without profiting from community spreads, unlike other chains.

topics.title: Explorer Infrastructure Migration to P2P DAO
topics.summary: Migration of main explorers from expensive Hetzner servers (680 euro/month) to P2P DAO infrastructure. The P2P system can handle 99% of queries, with beefy machines reserved for large queries requiring 120GB RAM.

topics.title: Market Making Requirements for Exchange Listings
topics.summary: Explanation of why market making is necessary for maintaining exchange listings and minimum volume requirements. Discussion of moving toward decentralized exchanges through Rosen bridge to avoid centralized exchange dependencies.

topics.title: VoltPay.Store Non-KYC Payment Platform Demo
topics.summary: Live demonstration of VoltPay.Store platform for crypto-to-gift card purchases using ERG without KYC requirements. The platform integrates with Trocador and multiple swap providers, enabling purchases of gift cards and prepaid services.

topics.title: USD Stablecoin Integration in MewDex
topics.summary: HQ3rr integrated native USD and Dexy Gold pools into MewDex with liquidity provision capabilities. The integration includes freemint and arbmint functions for price balancing between LP and bank protocols.

topics.title: Developer Updates and Project Progress
topics.summary: Review of recent development work including Game of Prompts interface completion, Banner contract improvements with 50+ PRs, kushti's chain cache testing, and Lithos 2.2.0 release with multi-threaded sync improvements.

topics.title: Ergo Trace 3D Blockchain Visualization Tool
topics.summary: Demonstration of new Ergo Trace tool by Degen's World that provides 3D visualization of blockchain transactions and address connections. The tool shows animated representations of transaction flows and wallet relationships.

topics.title: HQ3rr's New Wallet Integration Project
topics.summary: HQ3rr is developing a new dApp wallet with integrated Mew applications, allowing users to import wallets directly into browser with password protection. The wallet will provide swap, lock, and burn functions for tokens without external signing.

topics.title: Nautilus Buy ERG Integration and On-ramps
topics.summary: Discussion of the new Buy ERG button in Nautilus wallet connecting to Banksa, with potential integration of VoltPay.Store and Stealth X. Debate over centralized vs decentralized on-ramp options and their KYC requirements.

topics.title: Cornell University Blockchain Token Economy Implementation
topics.summary: Detailed walkthrough of Cornell's brick token system for students, including recycling rewards, plot payments, 3D printing discounts, and Amazon appreciation points. The system demonstrates real-world blockchain utility beyond speculation.

topics.title: Blockchain vs Crypto Philosophy Discussion
topics.summary: HQ3rr emphasizes the distinction between blockchain technology and cryptocurrency speculation, advocating for blockchain as database, validator, and utility tool beyond dollar valuations. Discussion of Ergo's core blockchain strengths over DeFi aspects.

topics.title: MewDex Socket Integration and Zero Confirmations
topics.summary: MewDex now supports socket connections for instant transaction visibility and chained transactions before confirmation. Discussion of Nautilus zero-conf feature enabling mempool transaction chaining with high success rates on Ergo.

topics.title: Ergo Santa DEX Campaign and Token Contributions
topics.summary: Launch of Ergo Santa campaign collecting tokens for DEX trading rewards. CannonQ and HQ3rr contribute millions of FAKU tokens, with airdrops planned based on DEX trading participation rather than simple distribution.

topics.title: TVL Metrics Manipulation and DeFi Rankings
topics.summary: Discussion of how easily DeFi metrics can be manipulated, with HQ3rr explaining how locking tokens could artificially boost TVL rankings on DeFiLlama within minutes. Criticism of meaningless metrics in the crypto industry.
